qas.question: What type of economy was technical education in Venezuela intended to support?
When did Venezuela begin to create institutes of technology?

context: Institutes of technology in Venezuela were developed in the <a1_0>1950s<a1_0/> as an option for post-secondary education in technical and scientific courses, after the polytechnic French concepts. At that time, technical education was considered essential for the development of a sound <a0_0>middle class<a0_0/> economy.
